summary: Dashboard Embedding Health widget fully tested. Widget displays donut chart with 100% indexed, Smart Search Health title with Brain icon, Fully Indexed green badge, and legend showing 'Indexed: 25'. Action link correctly hidden when all files are healthy. Backend API returning correct counts.
passed_tests: Frontend: Dashboard page loads with data-testid='dashboard-page'
Frontend: Embedding Health widget visible with data-testid='embedding-health'
Frontend: Widget shows donut chart SVG with '100%' and 'indexed' text
Frontend: Widget shows 'Smart Search Health' title with Brain icon
Frontend: Widget shows 'Fully Indexed' green badge when all files indexed
Frontend: Widget shows legend with 'Indexed: 25' count
Frontend: No 'Fix in Library' action link when everything is healthy (data-testid='embedding-health-action' correctly NOT present)
Backend: GET /api/files/embedding-stats returns correct counts (total=25, completed=25, failed=0, pending=0)
Frontend: Stats grid renders correctly (Total Files, Storage, Tags, Upload CTA cards)
Frontend: File Types section renders below embedding widget
Frontend: Popular Tags section renders correctly
critical_code_review_comments: EmbeddingHealthWidget component correctly receives stats from embeddingStats API
DonutChart component renders SVG segments with correct proportions based on completed/failed/pending/skipped
Status badge logic correctly determines 'Fully Indexed' when healthPct=100%
Action link (Fix in Library) correctly conditional on (failed > 0 || totalPending > 0)
data-testid attributes properly implemented for all key elements
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard Embedding Health widget verified. All 25 accessible files (22 owned + 3 public) are indexed. The widget correctly shows 100% indexed with green 'Fully Indexed' badge. The widget sits between the stats grid (4 cards) and the File Types/Popular Tags sections. When failed or pending > 0, the action link 'Fix in Library' should appear with data-testid='embedding-health-action'. Note: stats endpoint shows 22 total files (user-owned only) while embedding-stats shows 25 (includes public files) - this is expected behavior.

feature_verification.donut_chart: SVG donut with 100% indexed text - WORKING
feature_verification.smart_search_health_title: Brain icon + 'Smart Search Health' title - WORKING
feature_verification.action_link_hidden: data-testid='embedding-health-action' correctly NOT present when all healthy - WORKING
feature_verification.stats_grid: 4 cards (Total Files, Storage, Tags, Upload CTA) - WORKING
